attributes.action: the goverment need to take action against the percentage of workers found on building sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently unemployed i have been to various building sites looking for work,only to find 90% of the labour used is eastern europeans. british workers cant even work.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. Please rephrase the title of your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
